origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'HousingFundAPI.loan_repayment_methods', 'description': 'This function provides the available repayment methods for housing fund loans based on the member status and loan type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'memberStatus', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The status of the housing fund member, e.g., newGraduate, experiencedEmployee.'}, {'name': 'loanType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of loan, e.g., housing, education.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'methods', 'description': 'A list of available repayment methods for the loan.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 HousingFundAPI.loan_repayment_methods, 它的参数输入如下: 'memberStatus'是'newGraduate', 'loanType'是'housing'.
